content: pattern is japanese but fully charted using standard crochet symbols direct link to pattern pdf 1 no gauge is listed in the pattern **materials ** * japanese size 4/0 crochet hook 2 5 mm * recommended yarn is pierrot uv cut baby which is specially dyed to cut uv rays reaching the skin * color a scraps * color b 3g 10 2 m * color c 7g 23 8 m * color d 7g 23 8 m * batting polyfill or cotton * two small bells * 4 eye buttons * 2 nose buttons 1 http //www gosyo co jp/img/acrobat/28ss/bk1 pdf
